faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about StorySnap
faq.item1-answer: StorySnap uses advanced AI algorithms to analyze your image and generate a story based on its content.
faq.item2-question: What types of images can I use?
faq.item2-answer: StorySnap supports a wide range of images, including photos, illustrations, and graphics. The more detailed and descriptive your image, the better the resulting story.
faq.item3-question: Can I customize the story style?
faq.item3-answer: Yes, StorySnap offers multiple writing styles from professional to casual, ensuring your story matches your needs.
faq.item4-question: How many languages does StorySnap support?
faq.item4-answer: StorySnap currently supports English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Spanish. We are constantly expanding to support more languages.
faq.item5-answer: Yes, your image is private and secure. We do not share your image or story with anyone without your permission.
faq.item6-answer: Yes, StorySnap allows you to export your story in multiple formats, including PDF, HTML, and more.
